DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate response rate response duration patient relapse non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma treat daily oral etoposide . II . Describe toxic effect daily oral etoposide patient . III . Monitor etoposide trough level determine whether etoposide concentration correlate age , response , toxicity . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral etoposide daily 21 day . Treatment repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients complete partial remission receive 2 course past best response ( minimum 6 course ) . Patients stable disease 3 course may remove study . Patients follow every 6 month 2 year , annually survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 97 patient accrue study 2 year .
